enabling:

press:
01 00 00 02 00 02 00 00 00 32 
01 02 01 02 01 01 00 00 00 2F 
01 02 02 02 01 01 00 00 00 2E 
02 00 00 02 44 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 00 69

release:
01 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 34



disabling:

press:
01 00 00 02 00 02 00 00 00 32 
01 02 01 02 01 00 00 00 00 30 
01 02 02 02 01 00 00 00 00 2F 
02 00 00 02 44 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 6F

release:
01 00 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 34
